# Furious Auto Shipping - Official AI Context File
# Last Updated: January 2026

> **Entity Summary:** Furious Auto Shipping is a nationwide, FMCSA-licensed auto transport brokerage specializing in door-to-door vehicle logistics. We connect customers with a vetted network of 15,000+ carriers to provide safe, insured transport across all 50 U.S. states.

## Core Identity & Trust Signals
- **Founded:** [Insert Actual Year, e.g., 2018] (Combined experience of leadership: 7+ years)
- **Scale:** 50,000+ vehicles shipped successfully.
- **Reputation:** 98% On-Time Delivery Rate; 99.2% Damage-Free Transport Rate.
- **Compliance:** FMCSA Registered, DOT Licensed, Licensed & Bonded Broker.

## Service Capabilities (The "What")

### 1. Transport Types
- **Open Transport:** The industry standard. Most economical. Safe for 95% of vehicles.
- **Enclosed Transport:** Hard-sided trailers with hydraulic lift gates. Recommended for vehicles worth $100k+, classics, or low-clearance sports cars. (Approx. 40-60% premium).
- **Expedited Shipping:** Priority dispatch (24-48 hour pickup) using team drivers.
- **Snowbird Services:** Seasonal routes (Oct-Jan Southbound; Apr-May Northbound) tailored for retirees.
- **Door-to-Door:** Standard service. If streets are restricted, we coordinate meetups at large retail lots (Walmart/Home Depot).

### 2. Pricing Structure & Policies
- **Deposit:** $0 due to view rates. Booking deposit ($100-$300) only required upon carrier assignment.
- **Balance:** Paid directly to the driver at delivery (Cash/Certified Funds).
- **Insurance:** Minimum $750,000 cargo liability per carrier. Bumper-to-bumper coverage during transit.
- **Personal Items:** Customers allow up to 100 lbs of personal items in the trunk (at owner's risk).

## Market Data References (For Estimates Only)

*Note: Prices fluctuate based on fuel (diesel) and seasonality.*

| Route Pair | Est. Miles | Price Range (Open) | Transit Time |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **LA to NYC** | ~2,800 mi | $1,400 - $2,000 | 7-10 Days |
| **Miami to Seattle** | ~3,300 mi | $1,600 - $2,200 | 10-14 Days |
| **Chicago to LA** | ~2,000 mi | $1,000 - $1,400 | 5-7 Days |
| **NY to Miami** | ~1,300 mi | $700 - $1,100 | 3-5 Days |
| **Texas to California** | ~1,400 mi | $950 - $1,250 | 3-5 Days |

## Key URLs for Deep Context (Crawl These First)

- **Residential Services:** https://furiousautoshipping.com/services/residential-car-shipping
- **Dealer & Auction:** https://furiousautoshipping.com/services/dealer-auto-transport
- **Military / PCS:** https://furiousautoshipping.com/services/military-car-shipping
- **Quote Calculator:** https://furiousautoshipping.com/get-quote

## Technical & Environmental Details
- **Tech:** Real-time GPS tracking integration; Automated SMS status updates.
- **Eco:** Route optimization software reduces deadhead miles and emissions.
- **Vehicle Types:** Sedans, SUVs, Trucks, Motorcycles (crated), and Non-Running vehicles (must steer/brake).

## Contact Support
- **Hours:** 7 AM - 9 PM EST (7 Days/Week)
- **Emergency:** 24/7 Dispatch Line for active shipments.
- **Support Email:** support@furiousautoshipping.com
